column4: What package let's you configure QT apps in Gnome without installing KDE ?
If I install Ubuntu Desktop and after that the Kubuntu Desktop package, and put all the KDE apps in a submenu in the Application menu - will it affect KDE menu ?
auto mounts filesystems, like remotes ones
if you use remote filesystems then yes, other then that it's useless
If I install Breezy on a system that already has windows, will I see all my partitiones in Ubuntu ?
yes, most distros set it up for you, nenevr used WIndows with ubuntu so
you dont mean hidden do you?, you mean the file extension .desktop?
I mean the files that you creat, edit etc, to see an Icon in the 'Application' Menu, on the Desktop, on the panel... etc...
thants what I thought, they seem to be somewhere else in ubuntu
yeah, I can't find them, and when you install Kubuntu you get filled with Icons in the Application Menu and in System menu...
